First, gather the ingredients:

- Flour (all-purpose, bread, or gluten-free)
- Salt
- Water (or milk)
- Vegetable oil
- Egg
- Onion
- Ground beef
- Parsley (fresh or dried)
- Cumin (optional)

For the dough:

- Combine flour and salt in a large bowl. Add water (or milk) and oil, stirring until dough forms. Let rest for 30 minutes.
- Knead dough on a lightly floured surface until smooth and elastic. Cover with a damp cloth and let rest for another 30 minutes.
- Divide the dough into 6 equal pieces. Roll each piece into a ball and set aside. Cover with a damp cloth to prevent drying out.

For the filling:

- Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add onion and cook until translucent, about 5 minutes. Add ground beef and cook until browned, about 10 minutes. Season with salt, pepper, and cumin if desired. Transfer to a plate to cool completely.
- Mix parsley into the cooled filling mixture. Taste and adjust seasoning as needed.

To assemble:

- Roll out each dough ball into a thin circle about 5 inches in diameter. Place about 1/4 cup of filling in the center of the dough circle and fold in half to form a half moon shape. Press the edges together to seal them shut. Place on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone baking mat. Repeat with remaining dough balls and filling. Brush with egg wash if desired. 
- Bake at 400 degrees F for 15 minutes or until golden brown and cooked through. Serve warm or at room temperature with tahini sauce or plain yogurt for dipping if desired. Enjoy!

"A teoria de mercado" e "a teoria da ideologia" são conceitos filosóficos e filosógicos que se relacionam com a economia e a política. A teoria de mercado é uma visão filosófica que defende a livre-iniciativa e o livre-mercado como princípios fundamentais para a organização das relações econômicas e políticas. A teoria da ideologia, por outro lado, aborda o papel das ideologias na organização das sociedades e na formação de políticas.

Em resumo, a teoria de mercado se concentra no papel da livre-iniciativa e do livre-mercado como forças motivas para a prosperidade econômica e o desenvolvimento social. A teoria da ideologia, por outro lado, aborda o papel das ideologias na organização das sociedades e na formação de políticas.

A interação entre a teoria de mercado e a teoria da ideologia é complexa e tem sido objeto de debates filosóficos e políticos há vários séculos. Além disso, há debates sobre o impacto real dessas teorias na organização das sociedades e nas políticas. Embora haja debates sobre as implicações políticas de cada uma das teorias, elas continuam sendo importantes para entender o funcionamento da economia e da política.

system:
APA Citation Style Guide for a Blog Post, Academic Paper, or Research Report

APA (American Psychological Association) style is widely used in the social sciences to document sources, so it's a good choice for your paper. It is a standard format for writing research papers and citing sources in the social sciences. Here are some examples of common types of sources you might cite in an APA-style paper:

- Blogs: If the blog is hosted on a university website, it may have a unique URL and can be cited as a website. If the blog is hosted on a personal website or on another platform such as Medium, you can cite it as an online source.

- Academic journals: If the journal is published by an academic publisher, it will have a unique title, volume number, issue number, and date of publication. You can cite the journal using its title, followed by the abbreviation "J." and then the volume number, issue number, and date of publication. For example: (Jones, 2015b).

- Books: If the book was published by an academic publisher, you can cite it using its author's name, year of publication, book title, edition number if applicable, and publisher information. For example: (Jones, 2015).

- Websites: Websites can be cited as websites or URLs with a web address that is associated with them. The APA citation for a website should include the author's name, the date of access or publication (if it's not obvious), and the URL. For example: Jones, R. (2015). Example Website Title. Retrieved from https://examplewebsite.com/index.html

¿Cómo puedo inspirarme para la composición de una fotografía?

1.  ¿Qué me atrae en la imagen? ¿Es un momento, un lugar o una persona? ¿Cómo podría representarlo en una fotografía?
2.  ¿Cuál es el mensaje que quiero transmitir a través de la fotografía? ¿Qué es lo que quiero que el espectador sienta al ver la imagen?
3.  ¿Qué recursos tengo disponible para crear la imagen? ¿Cuáles son mis habilidades técnicas y creativas?
4.  ¿Qué elementos de la imagen podrían ser más destacados para capturar la atención del espectador? ¿Cómo podría usar la composición para centrar el interés en esas partes específicas de la imagen?
5.  ¿Qué otros medios me pueden ayudar a crear una composición eficaz, como la iluminación, la perspectiva y el ángulo de la cámara?
6.  ¿Puedo utilizar elementos gráficos o textos para complementar mi fotografía, como titulares, títulos o frases?
7.  ¿Puedo usar colores, texturas y formas para crear una sensación estética en la imagen? ¿Cómo puedo explorar nuevas formas de ver el mundo y encontrar nuevas oportunidades de inspiración?
8.  ¿Puedo experimentar con diferentes técnicas de composición, como lo hacen los pintores, y aplicarlas a mi arte fotográfico? ¿Puedo usar algunos métodos tradicionales de composición, como los principios del equilibrio, el número dorado y las líneas guías, y adaptarlos a mi estilo personal?
9.  ¿Puedo usar alguna herramienta creativa, como un bloque de notas o un cuaderno de ideas, para recordar mis ideas y explorar nuevas posibilidades antes de tomar las fotografías finales?
10.  ¿Puedo usar algún método automático de edición de imágenes para crear una base sólida antes de trabajar en los detalles manuales finales?
11.  Cuando sea necesario, ¿sé cómo aplicar correcciones de color, ajustes de exposición y otras técnicas para completar mi imagen finalmente con profesionalismo y calidad artística?

El procesamiento creativo es una parte importante del arte fotográfico y es una habilidad que se mejora con práctica y experimentación constante. Estos consejos son solo un comienzo; desafía tus límites creativos con nuevas técnicas y exploración constante.

This is an example of a technical description that a developer or engineer might write for an operating system virtual machine.

"Virtualization is a technology that allows multiple virtualized operating systems to run simultaneously on the same physical hardware. A hypervisor is a virtualization software component that creates and manages virtual machines and acts as a bridge between the physical hardware and the virtualized operating system. Virtualization software allows multiple virtual machines to run on a single physical server, enabling more efficient utilization of server resources.

Virtual machines can be created by copying the hard disk image of a physical machine and launching the copied virtual machine from a host. The host can then act as an emulator for the virtual machine, allowing it to run its own operating system and applications.

Hardware virtualization requires modifications to the hardware itself, often in the form of special hardware called virtual machines, which act as intermediaries between the physical hardware and the guest operating systems. These virtual machines are designed to emulate various types of computer hardware, such as CPUs, memory, and storage devices, allowing multiple guest operating systems to share resources in an efficient manner.

Virtualization can be used in many ways, including server consolidation, workload migration, disaster recovery, and testing and development environments. It provides a cost-effective way to scale computing resources without incurring additional hardware costs.

The hypervisor is responsible for managing the resources available to each guest operating system, including CPU time, memory allocation, and I/O access. It also provides isolation between guest operating systems, ensuring that each guest OS is isolated from other guests on the same host. Hypervisors are typically open source software developed by third parties or large tech companies like VMware or Microsoft."
source:

prompt: ### Human: "Hogyan tudom kiszámítani a variációk számát egy 3x4 táblázaton?"### Assistant:
system:
A 3x4 tabla está formada por 12 células, cada una de las cuales puede ser representada como un número natural entre 1 y 12. Para encontrar la variación de una tabla 3x4, se puede aplicar la fórmula:

Variación = N!/(N-r!)

Donde N es el número total de células de la tabla, r es el número de células repetidas, y N! es el número binomio binomial.

En este caso, la variación de una tabla 3x4 es N!/(N-3)! = 6/(7-3)! = 12/10! = 4.

Por lo tanto, la variación de una tabla 3x4 es cuatro células.
source: "Hogyan tudom kiszámítani a variációk számát egy 3x4 táblázaton?"

system:
"Para a válasz: "Como funciona um drone e sua rotina de voo?"

Para entender como funciona um drone e a rotina de voo dele, é preciso conhecer um pouco sobre o funcionamento da aerodinâmica e a física de fluidos.

Um drone é uma máquina que usa a aerodinâmica para mover-se no ar. Em sua maioria, são equipados com hélices, que giram em direção ao avião, empurrando-o para frente. Essas hélices giren através do ar, que passa por elas, gerando uma força de pouso para mantê-lo no ar.

Durante o voo, o drone tem que lidar com a resistência da atmosfera, que varia conforme o local onde está voando. Isso significa que os drones precisam trabalhar muito para manter seu altitude e sua velocidade, bem como para controlar seu aceleração e sua deceleração. Para conseguir isso, os drones usam um conjunto de sistemas e componentes, tais como rotores, controladores de posição, sensores e sistemas de propulsão.

A rotina de voo geralmente envolve:

- Preparação: Segurança, carga do combustível, carga do carregamento, avaliação do clima e dos ventos.

- Voo: O drone segue um perfil definido e mantém uma altitude segura enquanto acompanha a rota programada.

- Voo manual: O piloto pode mudar o perfil do drone ou fazer ajustes no controle para se adaptar às circunstâncias específicas.

- Descente: O piloto pode descer para a área de pouso pré-definida ou até mesmo para uma área próxima.

- Desligamento: O piloto desliga o sistema de posição do drone e as hélices param de girar.

Esse é um resumo básico da rotina de voo padrão de um drone. Com um pouco mais de informação sobre o funcionamento da aerodinâmica e a física de fluidos, é possível entender melhor como os drones funcionam e como eles lidam com as circunstâncias específicas em que estão voando."
source: "Hogyan tudom használni a szoftveresen definiált rádiót egy drón észlelésére és helymeghatározására, amely a tulajdonomban repül?"

8. In the Update field, enter "true" to update the position, rotation, and scale of your object each frame.
9. In the Physics Settings field, set Physics Mode to "Physics with KinematicBody".
10. In the Debug Settings field, set Debug Mode to "Editor Only". This will allow you to see your object's position and rotation in the editor but not in-game.
11. In the Visual Settings field, set Show Mode to "Wireframe". This will show your object's bones and joints in a wireframe style, making it easier to see its structure.
12. In the Collision Settings field, set Collision Type to "Kinematic". This will make your object invulnerable to collisions with other objects and will only collide with other KinematicBodies or CollisionShapes.
13. In the Joint Settings field, set Number of Joints to "1". This will create a single joint for your object that will control its movement in all directions.
14. In the Mesh Settings field, set Mesh Resolution to "64". This will create a high-resolution mesh for your object that will be more visually appealing and perform better in game.
15. In the Rigid Body Settings field, set Physics Type to "RigidBody". This will make your object behave like a physical body that can collide with other objects and be affected by forces like gravity and collisions.
16. In the Material Settings field, select Material 1 from the list and click on its properties tab. Set Material Type to "Physics with KinematicBody". This will assign a physics-enabled material type to your object that will allow it to interact with other physics-enabled objects and be affected by forces like gravity and collisions.
17. Select Physics Shapes from the list and click on its properties tab. Set Number of Shapes to "1". This will assign a single physics shape to your object that will allow it to interact with other physics shapes like boxes or spheres. You can also use multiple shapes if you want your object to interact with different shapes or objects in different ways or have multiple joints on it like legs or arms that interact differently than its body or head do..
18. Select Physics Settings from the list and click on its properties tab. Set Gravity Scale to "-10". This will make your object fall downwards at a rate of -10 units per second when no other forces are acting on it like gravity or collision forces.. Set Friction Scale to "-0". This will make your object slide on surfaces without friction like ice or metal.. Set Restitution Scale to "-0". This will make your object bounce off surfaces without damage like rubber balls do.. Set Collision Detection Type to "Distance Field". This will cause all collisions between this object and other objects in the scene to be handled by a distance field algorithm instead of rigid body physics collisions which can cause unexpected behavior.. Click on Apply Changes at the bottom right of the inspector window.. Your KinematicBody node should now be set up and ready for use!

select p.LastName, p.FirstName, a.City, a.State from Person p join Address a on p.PersonId = a.PersonId where p.LastName like 'Doe' and a.City='San Jose' order by City;

The "Fair Trade" movement, on the other hand, is different from the "Trade Justice" movement, which aims to promote fair trade policies. The Fair Trade movement is rooted in ethical consumerism, where consumers make a conscious choice to purchase products that are produced ethically and sustainably. The movement encourages people to support businesses that adhere to ethical standards and provide fair wages and working conditions for workers.

The following are some key differences between the two movements:

- The Fair Trade movement focuses on promoting ethical consumerism, while the Trade Justice movement focuses on promoting fair trade policies.

- The Fair Trade movement is often associated with small-scale producers, while the Trade Justice movement is more focused on larger businesses.

- The Fair Trade movement is not tied to a specific product or industry, while the Trade Justice movement focuses on specific commodities such as coffee, cocoa, and bananas.

- The Fair Trade movement tends to be more grassroots in nature, while the Trade Justice movement has a more top-down approach.

- The Fair Trade movement tends to focus on smaller producers and workers in developing countries, while the Trade Justice movement focuses on larger companies and workers in developed countries.

1. Introducción: Introduzco el tema y explico el significado de la calidad en los alimentos.
2. Investigación previa: Examino las investigaciones previas en el área y discuto los resultados que se han obtenido hasta el momento.
3. Métodos: Explico los métodos utilizados para realizar la investigación y discuto su efectividad.
4. Resultados: Presento los resultados de la investigación y discuto su significado.
5. Conclusión: Resumo los principales resultados y conclusiones de la investigación.

Es importante incluir referencias a estudios y artículos científicos que apoyen tus argumentos y que proporcionen un contexto para tu investigación. También es importante incluir estudios empíricos, así como estudios de casos, para demostrar cómo los métodos científicos pueden ser aplicados a la práctica real. Finalmente, es importante incluir una evaluación crítica de los resultados obtenidos y proponer nuevos estudios para profundizar en el tema.

The encoder consists of multiple layers of self-attention, which is a mechanism that takes in an input and outputs a representation of it. The following fonts are considered important and influential in the history of typography and graphic design:

1. Univers: Univers was designed by Adrian Frutiger in 1957 and is considered one of the most influential typefaces of the 20th century. It is a geometric sans-serif typeface with a simple, modern style that was originally designed for use in corporate and government publications.

2. Helvetica: Helvetica was designed by Max Miedinger and Eduard Hoffmann in 1957 and is considered one of the most widely used typefaces in the world. It is a sans-serif typeface with clean lines and geometric shapes that is often used for signage, posters, and other graphic design applications.

3. Futura: Futura was designed by Paul Renner in 1927 and is considered one of the most iconic typefaces of the 20th century. It is a geometric sans-serif typeface with sharp corners and clean lines that has been used in a variety of applications, from signage to advertising to film titles.

4. Baskerville: Baskerville was designed by John Baskerville in 1757 and is considered one of the most influential typefaces of the 18th century. It is a serif typeface with elegant curves and features that has been used in books, magazines, and other print publications for centuries.

5. Times New Roman: Times New Roman was designed by Stanley Morison in 1928 and is considered one of the most widely used typefaces in the world. It is a serif typeface with clean lines and geometric shapes that has been used in many publications, from newspapers to books to marketing materials.

6. Arial: Arial was designed by Paul Dijkstra in 1982 as an alternative to Times New Roman. It is a sans-serif typeface with simple, geometric shapes that has become one of the most popular fonts for computers and digital displays.

7. Bodoni: Bodoni was designed by Giambattista Bodoni in the early 19th century and is considered one of the most elegant typefaces ever created. It is a serif typeface with delicate curves and features that has been used in many high-end publications, including books, magazines, and fine art prints.

¡Hola! Sí, la tecnología CRISPR-Cas9 ha dado lugar a una transformación revolucionaria en el campo de la biología y la medicina. Desde su introducción en 2012, esta tecnología ha permitido realizar investigaciones y terapias que antes eran imposibles o muy complejas.

La tecnología CRISPR-Cas9 se basa en el mecanismo natural de defensa del sistema inmunitario de los microorganismos contra las infecciones bacterianas. En el proceso, se utiliza un acido ribonucleico (ARN) específico que actúa como una guía para la identificación y eliminación de genes específicos. Este mecanismo permite crear células modificadas con precisión, lo que permite corregir enfermedades causadas por alteraciones genéticas.

Además de ser útil en el campo de la biología y la medicina, esta tecnología también tiene implicaciones éticas y legales importantes. En el ámbito ético, se plantean preguntas sobre el uso de la tecnología para crear niños con características genéticas específicas o modificar características que consideramos inherentes a la humanidad. Al mismo tiempo, se evaluan los posibles beneficios y riesgos para la salud pública y el bienestar general de la comunidad.

En cuanto a las leyes legales, existen diferentes regulaciones en diferentes países sobre cómo se puede utilizar esta tecnología y si se requiere un permiso especial para realizar investigaciones o intervenciones terapéuticas con CRISPR-Cas9. La aplicación de estas leyes dependerá de la situación particular de cada país y institución, así como de las necesidades y preocupaciones particulares del público y los profesionales.

En resumen, la tecnología CRISPR-Cas9 es una herramienta revolucionaria que está transformando el mundo de la biología y la medicina, pero también plantea cuestiones éticas y legales importantes que requieren una vigilancia constante para garantizar su uso correcto y equilibrado.

Historia: La prensa ha sido una fuente importante de información y opiniones políticas desde la aparición de las primeras publicaciones en papel en la Edad Media. Sin embargo, desde la Revolución Francesa hasta el inicio del siglo XX, la prensa fue sometida a censura estatal y se vio controlada por la nobleza y la Iglesia. Después de la Primera Guerra Mundial, los medios se convirtieron en una fuente poderosa de información y opinión política que contribuyó a crear un ambiente de crítica y libre expresión.

Evolución de la tecnología y medios: La introducción de la imprenta en el siglo XVII tuvo un impacto importante en la prensa, ya que se podía distribuir más fácilmente a un número creciente de lectores. Además, el desarrollo del periodismo profesional, las redes de noticias y las agencias de prensa también contribuyeron a ampliar el alcance y la cohesión de los medios.

Desafíos actuales: Actualmente, los medios son más globales que nunca gracias a Internet y las redes sociales.
